Google Summer of Code 2009 Project Ideas

posted on: 4/2/2009, 9:31:00 PM

by: skamansam

List of projects for GSoC 2009

Google has announced a another Summer of Code for 2009 (video)! Here is a list of some project idea pages for this year.

  • GIMP
  • GNOME
  • Python
  • Mozilla
  • Jikes
  • Zikula
  • OLAT
  • Maemo
  • NetBSD
  • Tcl/Tk
  • Apache Software Foundation
  • The Linux Foundation
  • Drupal
  • KDE
  • Eclipse Foundation
  • The R Foundation
  • Open ACS
  • Arch Linux
  • Battle for Wesnoth
